column4: sigh.... Dr_Willis - i changed my username using the methods outlined here: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4968235
Dr_Willis: if you're already using the old home, all you have to do is modify names, not permissions, log in to the recovery console, usermod it to change the home, and mv the folder.
It's not a whole lot of work.  Four commands or something.
